title: Was Lady Gaga’s Super Bowl Halftime Show Satanic?
subtitle: Some observers claimed they saw elements of a 'Satanic ritual' in Lady Gaga's halftime performance at the 2017 Super Bowl. Do they even know what a Satanic ritual looks like?
author: David Emery
vclaim: Lady Gaga's halftime performance at the 2017 Super Bowl took the form of a Satanic ritual.
